710917f-a.text:
4th Street, south on west side from 324 West 4th Street, north of 12th Street, to the S.W. corner of Bank Street, also showing
329-27 West 4th Street, east side.
May 4, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

710918f-a.text:
327-325-323 and 31V West 4th Street, including both N.E. and S.E.
corners of 12th Street.
The A. & P. store shown in 319, on the S.E. corner, will later move over to the N.W. corner, its place being taken by a fruit market.
May 4, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

711155f-a.text:
12th Street (formerly Troy Street) at and adjoining S.W. corner of weat 4th Street, showing 279-2o5 West 12th Street.
March 12, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

711156f-a.text:
12th Street (formerly Troy Street), east from West 4th Street.
July 7, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.

710925f-a.text:
4th Street, east side, north from and including 12th Street. The street car is on Eighth Avenue, which 4th Street crosses north of
12th Street.
February 6, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
